keyFacts: The invoice details shipping charges totaling USD $174.73 for services rendered to Jeffrey E. Epstein.
Multiple shipments were made by Epstein during October 2004, with various senders and recipients.
Discounts totaling USD $20.86 were applied to the invoice.
The invoice includes specific details about pickup dates and delivery commitments for FedEx services.
Several individuals are mentioned as senders or recipients of shipments associated with Epstein.
